item.title: テッド・クルーズ米上院議員、自身のポッドキャストを主催するiHeartMediaが、自身の再選を確実にするためだけに存在するPACに2023年に63万ドル以上を提供したとの報道に反論（Shannon Ryan/ABC13）
item.description:
Shannon Ryan / ABC13:
US Sen. Ted Cruz pushes back against reports that iHeartMedia, which hosts his podcast, gave $630K+ in 2023 to a PAC that exists solely to ensure his reelection  —  Sen. Ted Cruz is facing questions over a tangled web of political contributions involving the company that airs his podcast.

item.title: App Store、Apple TV、Podcasts、Musicを含むアップルのオンラインサービスの一部が、少なくとも米国東部時間午後6時31分以降、世界的にダウンしている模様だ（Richard Lawler/The Verge）。
item.description:
Richard Lawler / The Verge:
Some of Apple's online services, including the App Store, Apple TV, Podcasts, and Music, appear to be down globally since at least 6:31pm ET  —  Apple's online services appear to be having some problems, with an outage cutting many of us off from the App Store, Apple TV, and Apple Music.

item.title: 2022年にサンタイムズを買収したシカゴ・パブリック・メディアがレイオフを発表、公共ラジオ局WBEZの組合員コンテンツ制作者62人のうち15％近くを削減（Dave McKinney/WBEZ Chicago）
item.description:
Dave McKinney / WBEZ Chicago:
Chicago Public Media, which bought the Sun-Times in 2022, announces layoffs, cutting nearly 15% of 62 unionized content creators at public radio station WBEZ  —  The move to terminate nearly 15% of 62 unionized content creators at WBEZ and four people at the Chicago Sun-Times comes amid …

item.title: 情報筋アポロ・グローバル・マネジメントが先週末、パラマウントに対し、260億ドル以上での完全買収に関心を持っていると伝えたが、パラマウントは関与しないことを選択した（ニューヨーク・タイムズ）。
item.description:
New York Times:
Sources: Apollo Global Management told Paramount over last weekend that it was interested in acquiring the full company for $26B+; Paramount chose not to engage  —  Paramount's board of directors, which was already deep into talks with the media company Skydance, didn't engage with the offer.

item.title: グルーポ・テレビサはAT&Tが保有するスカイ・メキシコの株式を2027年と2028年に買い取る予定。スカイのルイス・マルビドCEOは4月15日に退任し、フランシスコ・ヴァリムが後任となる（Andrea Navarro/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Andrea Navarro / Bloomberg:
Grupo Televisa plans to buy out AT&T's stake in Sky Mexico, payable in 2027 and 2028; Sky CEO Luis Malvido will leave on April 15, replaced by Francisco Valim  —  - Companies did not disclose an amount for the transaction  — The stake will be paid in 2027 and 2028, Televisa added

item.title: Newsflash、CEN、AsiaWire、Clipzillaを含む30人の従業員を抱えるマイケル・ライディヒの通信社ネットワークが、委託予算の減少を理由に閉鎖（Dominic Ponsford/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Dominic Ponsford / Press Gazette:
Michael Leidig's news agency network, which employs 30 and includes Newsflash, CEN, AsiaWire, and Clipzilla, shuts down, citing a fall in commissioning budgets  —  Michael Leidig blames fall in commissioning budgets and newsroom AI for difficulties.  —  A news agency network that employs 30 people …

item.title: 情報筋Paramount取締役会とSkydance Mediaが独占的合併協議に合意、Paramountは他の入札者との協議を一時停止、PARAは～15％上昇（Jessica Toonkel/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Jessica Toonkel / Wall Street Journal:
Sources: Paramount's board and Skydance Media agree to exclusive merger discussions, and Paramount will pause talks with other bidders; PARA rises ~15%  —  Agreement paves the way for an exit by controlling shareholder Shari Redstone  —  A deal between Paramount and Skydance is potentially one step closer to happening.

item.title: Facebookがモバイル動画プレーヤーをアップデート、TikTokのような縦長の外観と、リール、ライブ、長編動画用の新しいコントロールを搭載、まずは米国とカナダから（Amrita Khalid/The Verge）
item.description:
Amrita Khalid / The Verge:
Facebook updates its mobile video player with a TikTok-like vertical look and new controls for Reels, Live, and longform videos, starting with the US and Canada  —  Facebook is launching an updated mobile video player that will bring the vertical look made ubiquitous by TikTok and Reels …

item.title: RokuがNBAと提携し、史上初のNBAブランドのFASTチャンネルと、バスケットボール・コンテンツにアクセスできるNBA Zoneコンテンツ・ハブを開設（David Satin/The Streamable）
item.description:
David Satin / The Streamable:
Roku partners with the NBA to launch the first-ever NBA-branded FAST channel, and a NBA Zone content hub with access to basketball content  —  Fans will be able to watch classic games, see highlights, originals, documentaries and more on the first-ever NBA FAST channel.

item.title: Stability AI、著作権フリーのオーディオサンプルから3分間のサウンドクリップを作成できる「Stable Audio 2.0」をリリース、ウェブサイトから無料で入手可能（Emilia David/The Verge）

Stability AI releases Stable Audio 2.0, which lets users create three-minute sound clips from copyright-free audio samples, available for free via its website  —  Stable Audio 2., an audio generation model for Stability AI, now lets users upload their own audio samples which they can then …

item.title: スポティファイがLive Experiencesを発表、ブランドがスポティファイのイベントのスポンサーになることを初めて許可、最初の1年で5～20の無料Live Experiencesを計画（Mark Stenberg/Adweek）
item.description:
Mark Stenberg / Adweek:
Spotify unveils Live Experiences, letting brands sponsor Spotify events for the first time, and plans five to 20 free Live Experiences in the first year  —  Spotify's latest advertising product, Live Experiences, lets brands integrate with and sponsor its events for the first time.

item.title: 情報筋スポティファイ、4月末までに英国、オーストラリア、パキスタン、他2市場で月額1～2ドルの値上げを計画、米国は2024年後半（Bloomberg）
item.description:
Bloomberg:
Sources: Spotify plans to raise prices by $1 to $2 per month in the UK, Australia, Pakistan, and two other markets by the end of April, and the US later in 2024  —  - The audio service will raise prices in a few major markets  — Spotify will create new plan that doesn't include audiobooks
